divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking outside my window at this weird cloud that was shaped like a disc. I just stared at it for like 3 minutes. then something can out of it it was flashing. I thought it was a plane. But planes have different colors flashing this one had only white. the it was headed east for like about a minute. Its seed was medium. then it just disappeared. Then 3 minutes later the weird cloud vanished. I don't know exact if it was an UFO but i am positive it was. when that happened i was like what is that i tried to get it in a picture but my camera couldn't get it somehow
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Lakewood
There was one other sighting in Lakewood on or around September 25th 2008
Summary: look outside my window saw a weird shape cloud something popped out of it flashing then dissappered
